import { Component, ViewChild, AfterViewInit, ElementRef } from '@angular/core';

import { NavController } from 'ionic-angular';


@Component({

selector: 'page-speech',

templateUrl: 'speech.html'

})

export class SpeechPage implements AfterViewInit {

@ViewChild('speechTxtArea') speechTxtArea: ElementRef;


lang: string = "ko-KR";

constructor(public navCtrl: NavController) {

}


ngAfterViewInit() {

this.speechTxtArea['_elementRef'].nativeElement.style.height = window.innerHeight * 0.5+'px';

console.log('nativeElement?', this.speechTxtArea);

}
